432580.name: Super Bomb Rush! - Official Soundtrack
432580.description:
Just as intense as the action itself, the Official Super Bomb Rush! Soundtrack is here!

Featured Tracks:

  • daPlaque - Dream

  • daPlaque - Ultimate

  • Hinkik - Explorers
  • Hinkik - Skystrike
  • Inaki - Phoenix
  • Inova - Seamonster
  • Krewella - Party Monster

  • Last Call - ft. Repel The Robot
